ARABIC: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Almighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The revelation of this Book is from God, the mighty and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The revelation of this Book is from Allah, the Most Mighty, the Most Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This Book is revealed from God the Majestic and All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The sending down of this Book is from Allah the Most Honourable, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Almighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The sending down of the Book is from God, the All-mighty, the All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The revelation of the Scripture is from Allah the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This Book is sent down from God, the Almighty, the Wise One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The [gradual] sending down of the Book is from Allah, the All-mighty, the All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Revelation of the Book is from Allah the Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The revelation of the Book (this Quran) is from Allah, the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The sending down of the Book is from Allah, the Almighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The sending down of the Scripture is from God, the Honorable, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [46:2] The revelation of the Book, the Qur’ān (tanzīlu’l-kitābi, the subject) is from God (mina’Llāhi, the predicate thereof), the Mighty, in His kingdom, the Wise, in His actions.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The revelation of the Scripture) this Scripture is a speech from (from Allah the Mighty) in retribution against those who disbelieve in Him, (the Wise) in His command and decree; He commanded that none should be worshipped beside Him.
